casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. John BURKS, III
v.
STATE of Louisiana NO. 2017-KH-0961 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 28, 2018

ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE 19th JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT FOR THE PARISH OF EAST BATON ROUGE

Denied.

HUGHES, J., would grant to remand for an evidentiary hearing on the Counterman claim.
